C:/Documents and Settings/cmatei/My Documents/GraspitVersions/Graspit-2-1/src/SoftContact.h

00001 /************************************
00002 SoftContact.h
00003 Claire Lackner
00004 
00005 This implements a class, SoftContact, creates a contact between two models
00006 which is not rigid.  The contact is modelled by allowing the two surfaces 
00007 to interpenetrate.  The models are locally fitted by second order polynomials
00008 around the contact.  This polynomial surfaces are allowed to interpenetrate
00009 and interact governed by Hertz contact theory.
00010 
00011 *************************************/
